name: Redouble AI
long_description:
Redouble is the solution to scale human-in-the-loop for AI workflows in regulated industries. 

Companies are increasingly adopting LLMs to automate their workflows, but sufficiently accurate and consistent outputs are hard to obtain, especially in regulated industries where mistakes are costly. As a result, AI companies are using human reviewers in production to verify and correct the output of their AI pipelines - which quickly becomes an unsustainable bottleneck for growth. 

Our solution dynamically learns from our clients' unique domain specific human feedback data; provides recommendations whether to send the output of a LLM pipeline to a human for review; monitors the insights obtained from human reviewers at scale, while also flagging suspicious reviews to ensure consistent final outputs; and integrates easily with our clients' existing pipelines via a small number of simple API calls.
one_liner: Automated Quality Control for AI Workflows in Regulated Industries
